name: Curiosity (itch) (cakemonitor)
description:
A short puzzle game about a cat.

WASD & Space.

Spend some of your 9 lives. Be a ghost! Float through walls! Be a cat again! Drink cream!!

It's actually a very short game - made in one weekend for Ludum Dare 44. I didn't start until mid-morning on Sunday and I finished it up on Monday so it's a Jam entry, but I otherwise followed all of the Compo rules, for whatever that's worth.

My day job has been keeping me too busy of late so I've become kinda rusty, but it was good to get back into creative work for a change. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate on something in the future :)
